CustomField.formula: IF ( ISPICKVAL( Priorite__c ,"Élevée") , IMAGE("/resource/1552558947000/ICONS_ACT_HIGH_Priority", "Élevée", 40 ,40) , IF ( ISPICKVAL(Priorite__c,"Moyenne") , IMAGE("/resource/1552559689000/ICONS_ACT_medium_priority", "Moyenne", 40 ,40) , IF ( ISPICKVAL( Priorite__c ,"Faible") , IMAGE("/resource/1552558931000/ICONS_ACT_Priority_Low", "Faible", 40 ,40) , "" ) ) )
CustomField.label: Icone Priorité
